text: John Taylor, D.D. (b Kiddington 6 July 1711 - d Salisbury 29 August 1772) was an English priest in the 18th-century.Art Uk Trimnel was educated at Christ Church, Oxford.Alumni Oxonienses (171501886) Surnames beginning L-R Taylor was Archdeacon of Bedford from 1745 until 1756 and Archdeacon of Leicester from then until his death. == Notes == Category:1772 deaths Category:Alumni of Christ Church, Oxford Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:18th-century English people Category:18th-century English Anglican priests Category:1711 births Category:People from Oxfordshire
title: John Taylor (priest)
